titleInfo.title: Letter, J. Crozier Ramsey in Knoxville, Tenn., to J.G.M. Ramsey, in Charlotte, N.C. 1867 December 18

mods.abstract: Dec. 18, 1867 letter from J.Crozier Ramsey in Knoxville, Tenn. to his father, J.G.M. Ramsey in Charlotte, N.C. Discusses favorable property sales and encloses a deed for Lizzie which is to be signed, notarized and returned quickly to him. Expresses hopes for upcoming court cases involving his father and others. Mentions his desire to answer his 'Ma's' long letter--shortly after court session has ended.
